message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its value exceeds $15000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. To make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $20000. This is an excellent chance to acquire a piece that could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm interested in purchasing the product for a lower price. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
